item.title: My First Post
item.description:
Hello World ğŸ‘‹! If you and me are able to read this i have successfully made a blog using hugo ğŸ¥³ğŸ‰!

A hello world is pretty boring on its own so allow me to introduce myself.

I’m Luke Lipscombe, and I am currently a student who likes to self teach programing in my spare time. I use Linux as my daily driver and i have been for about 2 years at the time of writing this.

In this blog I want to share:

  • My programing journey ğŸš€
  • The projects i make and the process behind them in detail ğŸ—ï¸.

I also just realized this is my first ever blog post ğŸ¤¯. Thanks for reading!
